version_description:
Thank you Waking Mars fans!!

- Waking Mars now supports Japanese!
- GameCenter achievement progress is updated every time the game starts.
- Player can no longer move when using sentient visualizer.
- Fixed Signal Chamber quest breakage.

Thank you Waking Mars fans!!

- Waking Mars now supports Japanese!
- GameCenter achievement progress is updated every time the game starts.
- Player can no longer move when using sentient visualizer.
- Fixed Signal Chamber quest breakage.

64-bit support.
Fixed Japanese text.

64-bit support.
Fixed Japanese text.
Fixed crash when exiting At The Gates.
Fixed crash when exiting At The Gates.

Thanks for playing this GameClub game! GameClub offers a curated catalog of iconic games, with new titles released every week. Subscribers get access to unlimited gameplay, no ads, and no additional purchases — just pure fun.

This update contains bug fixes and performance improvements. Let’s play!
